useCase.name: View Campers Schedule
useCase.description: As a Camp Worker, I want to view the schedule and location of assigned campers.

preconditions.precondition: The Camp Worker is logged into the Camp Management System.

successEndConditions.condition: The Camp Worker successfully views the schedule and location of assigned campers.

useCase.trigger: User selects the option to view campers' schedule.

mainSequence.step: Camp Worker logs into the system.
System fetches the list of assigned campers.
System retrieves the schedule and location for each camper.
System displays the campers along with their schedule and location to the Camp Worker.
